mapper.select: select count(*) from member where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(m_name, birth, gender, selNum, m_id, m_pw) values(#{m_name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{selNum}, #{m_id}, #{m_pw})
mapper.select: select * from member where member_id=#{member_id} and member_pw=#{member_pw} and cancel_or_not=1
mapper.update: update member set member_pw=#{member_pw}, member_name=#{member_name}, gender=#{gender}, selNum=#{selNum}, update_date=now() where member_id=#{member_id}
update member set cancel_or_not=-1, cancel_date=now() where member_idx=#{member_idx}
